definition: US Department of State

sentences.english: Environmental protection departments under the State Council shall be held responsible for the interpretation of This Bylaw .
sentences.chinese: 本细则由国务院环境保护部门负责解释。

sentences.english: Is the artist at the national level, enjoy State Council special benefit.
sentences.chinese: 系国家一级美术师，享受国务院特殊津贴。

sentences.english: For registered mail, compensation shall be made according to standard amounts formulated by the competent department of postal services under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 挂号信件，按照国务院邮政主管部门规定的金额赔偿。

sentences.english: The state Department approved Shenzhen city to be a coastal, economic open zone.
sentences.chinese: 国务院批准深圳为沿海经济开放城市。

sentences.english: The State Department is simply not equipped to handle interdepartmental machinery.
sentences.chinese: 国务院根本不具备驾驭部际机构的能力。

sentences.english: Tense negotiations were under way in the State Department conference room.
sentences.chinese: 在国务院会议厅里，正进行着激烈的协商。

sentences.english: Article 32. Environmental protection departments under the State Council shall be held responsible for the interpretation of This Bylaw .
sentences.chinese: 第三十二条本细则由国务院环境保护部门负责解释。

sentences.english: He is a national important contribution expert and is granted a Special Allowance from the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 国家级有突出贡献专家，国务院特殊津贴获得者。

sentences.english: In 2005, he was approved to receive the State Council special allowance.
sentences.chinese: 2005年被批准享受国务院特殊津贴。

sentences.english: Jiang Zhigang was appointed Vice-Chairman of State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration.
sentences.chinese: 姜志刚任国务院国有资产监督管理委员会副主任。

sentences.english: Article 7 The department of finance under the State Council shall administer the accounting work throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 第七条国务院财政部门主管全国的会计工作。

sentences.english: Feng Fei, department director of Industrial Economy in Development Research Center of the State Council, told the reporter.
sentences.chinese: 国务院发展研究中心产业经济部部长冯飞告诉记者。

sentences.english: e.other expenses relating to unemployment insurance stipulated or approved by the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 国务院规定或者批准的与失业保险有关的其他费用。

sentences.english: State Council held a picturephone meeting on developing recycling economy.
sentences.chinese: 昨天下午，国务院召开发展循环经济电视电话会议。

sentences.english: The super transport ministry has been established in the super ministry reform of the State Council recently.
sentences.chinese: 近期国务院实行了大部制改革，成立了大交通部。

sentences.english: August 27, 1982, approved by the State Council officially open ports.
sentences.chinese: 1982年8月27日，经国务院批准口岸正式开放。
